page.title: 20CREDITS AND ACKNOWLEDGEMENTS
page.content:
These are the members of Perin's Community School Alresford who took part in the Domesday Project with the BBC during 1985. J.Butler, S.Browning, K.Cooper, N.Macrae, F.Holt, B.Backhouse, G.Goodman, J.Irwin, B.Perry, R.Gibbs, R.Secluna, R.Lawes, E.Jones, A.Parker, M.Peters, M.Elton, J.Fowler, S.Smith, A.Berger, Z.Saunders, A.Day, R.Platt, I.Gosling, C.Howarden, H.Biddle. The teacher coordinator was D.Beck with assistance from N.Hannan and J.Mackenzie.
Thanks are due to the Reverend Trasler for permission to take photographs from the Tower of St. John's Church Alresford; and to R.Downham C.B.E. who helped D.Beck to climb the tower and ensured the Bells were safely 'down'.
